front.title: A YANG Model for VPN Service Performance Monitoring

abstract.t: As specified in [RFC8345], the data model defined in [RFC8345] introduces vertical layering relationships between networks that can be augmented to cover network/service topologies. This document defines a YANG Model for VPN Service Performance Monitoring that can be used to monitor and manage network Performance between VPN sites and it is an augmentation to the I2RS network topology YANG data model.
